data.quote: My mom had early rap records, like Jimmy Spicer. In the middle of the records was a turntable and a receiver - I used to scratch records on it - and on top was a reel-to-reel. In front of that wall were more stacks of records. It was either Mom's record or Pop's record, and they had their names on each and every one.
data.author: Jay-Z

data.quote: I fell in love with stories watching a British television puppet show called 'Thunderbirds' when it first came out on TV, about 1965, so I would have been 4 or 5 years old. I went out into the garden at my mom and dad's house, and I used to play with my little dinky toys, little cars and trucks and things.
data.author: Peter Jackson

data.quote: At the end of the day, I'm Violet's mom, and I want the best for her.
data.author: Christina Milian

data.quote: Violet speaks Spanish and understands it. She loves Cuban food! My mom is very good at teaching her about our culture, whether it be the food or Spanish or explaining to her that she's Cuban.
data.author: Christina Milian

data.quote: My mom always told me I could do or be anything I dared to dream, and I always wanted to work in the movie industry.
data.author: Octavia Spencer

data.quote: The first thing I do when I'm shopping is touch everything to see if it's itchy. I remember my mom used to put me in the itchiest clothes ever, and I was traumatized by it, so I won't wear anything itchy now.
data.author: Kourtney Kardashian

data.quote: When I was 15, my mom and I packed everything up and moved to Nashville so I could pursue my dream in music.
data.author: Kelsea Ballerini

data.quote: My parents told me from the time I can remember that, 'Yeah, you're adopted. But this is your family.' I can remember my mom, she tells me this story: when I was little, I was looking at her, and I was like, 'Why isn't my skin the same color as yours?' She was like, 'Oh, you're adopted, but I wish I had pretty brown skin like you.'
data.author: Colin Kaepernick

data.quote: Once you're a mom, always a mom. It's like riding a bike, you never forget.
data.author: Taraji P. Henson

data.quote: Statistics are to baseball what a flaky crust is to Mom's apple pie.
data.author: Harry Reasoner

data.quote: I think it's a tough road if you're a stay-at-home mom, a working mom, if you have a partner, if you don't. It's the best job in the world, and the toughest job in the world all at the same time.
data.author: Angela Kinsey

data.quote: I want to thank my mom, Brenda Rose. My heart, the reason I play the way I play, just everything. Just knowing the days I don't feel right, going to practice, having a hard time, I think about her when she had to wake me up, go to work and make sure I was all right. Those were hard days.
data.author: Derrick Rose

data.quote: My mom was a free spirit, and she brought me up to be a free spirit.
data.author: Mark Bradford

data.quote: My parents couldn't give me a whole lot of financial support, but they gave me good genes. My dad is a handsome son-of-a-gun, and my mom is beautiful. And I've definitely been the lucky recipient. So, thank you, Mom and Dad.
data.author: Ashton Kutcher

data.quote: My guess is my brother would call his mom and his dad pretty regularly, a lot more than I probably did.
data.author: Jeb Bush

data.quote: My mom used to call me a parrot, because the way I spoke would change in every country we'd go to.
data.author: Hannah Simone

data.quote: I feel like a good mom. I'm a strong woman now... Don't look down on me. Pray for me because I'm trying.
data.author: Fantasia Barrino

data.quote: Every man must define his identity against his mother. If he does not, he just falls back into her and is swallowed up.
data.author: Camille Paglia

data.quote: I'm trying hard to keep my Australian accent. My mom would disown me if I didn't.
data.author: Maia Mitchell

data.quote: Who in their infinite wisdom decreed that Little League uniforms be white? Certainly not a mother.
data.author: Erma Bombeck

data.quote: I remember my mom threatening me, half-serious: 'You know what? I should take you to Pittsburgh and put you in dance lessons just to keep you occupied.' Well, that brought everything to a screeching halt. 'Jeeze, dance lessons.' In retrospect, it would have been awesome, but then, 'Ugh, dancing - dancing's for sissies.'
data.author: Michael Keaton

data.quote: For the first few years of my life my mom used to cut my hair so there were a lot of bowl-cut hair styles.
data.author: Ne-Yo

data.quote: One-year-olds learn concealment. Five-year-olds lie outright: they manipulate via flattery. Nine-year-olds - masters of the cover-up. By the time you enter college, you're going to lie to your mom in one out of every five interactions.
data.author: Pamela Meyer

data.quote: Minimalism? It is something I appreciate as an art form but leave to others - unless you count a collection of warhorse-workwear Yves Saint Laurent trouser suits. Maybe my penchant for hippie-deluxe eccentricity came from an escapist dream of a different world. It was tough being a working mom in the 1970s.
data.author: Suzy Menkes

data.quote: My mom has always wished me a daughter just like me.
data.author: Pink

data.quote: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Toronto is a special city, and the environment is perfect for the arts; free and alive. I'm a New Yorker, and Toronto reminds me of a much cleaner New York, so it's like coming home after your mom just cleaned your room for you; for me that's a lovely environment.
data.author: Emory Cohen

data.quote: My mom didn't want us to go to the candy house, she didn't want us to go to the ice cream truck, she didn't want us to go to the... There was actually a donut truck, if that makes sense.
data.author: Venus Williams

data.quote: The mother-child relationship is paradoxical and, in a sense, tragic. It requires the most intense love on the mother's side, yet this very love must help the child grow away from the mother, and to become fully independent.
data.author: Erich Fromm

data.quote: When I get high anxiety, I vomit. My mom was so stressed out. Then I found out I was staying in John Mayer's old dorm room, and I had a nice roommate. That completely brought me down. I was completely comfortable at Berklee.
data.author: Charlie Puth

data.quote: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
data.author: Meryl Streep

data.quote: The fastest way to break the cycle of perfectionism and become a fearless mother is to give up the idea of doing it perfectly - indeed to embrace uncertainty and imperfection.
data.author: Arianna Huffington

data.quote: Motherhood is priced Of God, at price no man may dare To lessen or misunderstand.
data.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

data.quote: Dad's Jewish and Irish, Mom's German and Scotch. I couldn't say I was anything. My last name isn't even Downey. My dad changed his name when he wanted to get into the Army and was underage. My real name is Robert Elias. I feel like I'm still looking for a home in some way.
data.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

data.quote: My mom, she wasn't like a baseball mother who knew everything about the game. She just wanted me to be happy with what I was doing.
data.author: David Ortiz

data.quote: What makes me happy is just curling up in with my mom in her bed and watching a marathon of 'CSI' and 'Grey's Anatomy' episodes with pints of ice cream.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: A lot of times when people become successful, people don't really understand what they had to do or the sacrifices they made to do that, or they assume that they had money. This is coming from, like, a kid who was broke and lived with roaches and a single mom in Dorchester.
data.author: Clinton Sparks

data.quote: A father may turn his back on his child, brothers and sisters may become inveterate enemies, husbands may desert their wives, wives their husbands. But a mother's love endures through all.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: Sunscreen is my number 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 tip. I'm a fanatic, partially because I live in L.A. and have fair skin and freckles, and partially because of my kids. My mom always made me wear sunscreen and I'm trying to be that mom for them.
data.author: Alison Sweeney

data.quote: My mom didn't ever think I would take to acting because I was a very shy, very reserved kind of child. But obviously, something changed!
data.author: Abigail Breslin

data.quote: The best part about playing a mom is that people hug moms. I get hugs all the time. It really makes hard days a lot easier, and easy days are downright joyous.
data.author: Kim Rhodes

data.quote: If I could get any animal it would be a dolphin. I want one so bad. Me and my mom went swimming with dolphins and I was like, 'How do we get one of those?' and she was like, 'You can't get a dolphin. What are you gonna do, like, put it in your pool?'
data.author: Miley Cyrus

data.quote: When I was 7, an old lady was driving too fast in my neighborhood and hit me with her car. I was running out of the house, and when I got halfway into the street, my mom saw the car and yelled for me to run back. As I turned around the car hit me, dragged me five houses down the road, and I fractured my collarbone.
data.author: Rutina Wesley

data.quote: When I was a kid and my mom made tomato soup, she would cut buttered toast into squares and float them on top of each bowl.
data.author: Tom Douglas

data.quote: Mom always told us to wear pretty, matching underwear.
data.author: Kourtney Kardashian

data.quote: My mom started smoking when she was 11. She went to the hill next door to try her first cigarette. She set the entire hill on fire, but it didn't deter her.
data.author: Loni Anderson

data.quote: My mom was a terrible parent of young children. And thank God - I thank God every time I think of it - I was sent to my paternal grandmother. Ah, but my mother was a great parent of a young adult.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: What motivated me? My mother. My mother was an immigrant woman, a peasant woman, struggled all her life, worked in the garment center.
data.author: Al Lewis

data.quote: I hear my friends and my mom tell me I'm special, but honestly, I still don't get it.
data.author: LeBron James

data.quote: It's about getting the kids up and fed, getting one to school, getting the other down for a nap, going to the grocery store, picking one up from school, getting the other one down for another nap, cooking dinner... I live my life at these two extremes. I'm either a full-time stay-at-home mom or a full-time actress.
data.author: Jennifer Garner

data.quote: My mom used to take me down to the Jersey Shore when I was 7, 8, 9 years old. I can remember being down in that area - Belmar, Seaside Heights, Asbury Park and all those places that I went back and revisited.
data.author: David Cassidy

data.quote: My mom was concerned that us four little black girls have a really well-balanced life. She wanted us to be around people like us, but we also went to private school and traveled all the time. Now I fit in most places because I've been most places.
data.author: Kelis

data.quote: My mom, she's a great cook. You know, pirogue, borscht. I love borscht, and I love Pilemeni, meat dumplings.
data.author: Irina Shayk

data.quote: Mom and Pop were just a couple of kids when they got married. He was eighteen, she was sixteen and I was three.
data.author: Billie Holiday

data.quote: My mom was sarcastic about men. She would tell me Adam was the rough draft and Eve was the final product. She was a feminist minister, an earth mom who wore a bra only on Sundays.
data.author: Daphne Zuniga

data.quote: I grabbed my mom and I went to the couch and I said, 'Mom I want to ask Jesus to come into my heart.' And I got on my knee and I asked Jesus to come into my heart, forgive me of my sins, and make me a child of God.
data.author: Tim Tebow

data.quote: Our parents are obviously proud, but they're still trying to get used to the fact that we're in a band. I have a feeling my mom would actually like One Direction if I wasn't in it!
data.author: Zayn Malik

data.quote: I'm kind of lucky that we've finished shooting 'Cougar Town,' so I'm able to kind of just enjoy my pregnancy and be a stay-at-home mom and go to prenatal Pilates and do all that fun stuff that, if I were working, would be almost impossible to do.
data.author: Busy Philipps

data.quote: Did Superman really want to save the world, or did he just feel like he had to? Would he much rather be a farmer? Maybe. Would he much rather be hanging out with his dad and his mom and his dog? Probably.
data.author: Gerard Way

data.quote: I'm too young to have kids, but I really want to be a mom. I don't know if it's a Latin thing, but I love kids.
data.author: Alice Braga

data.quote: I'm raised by a single mom and didn't have pops around for the most part of my life. And she, by any means necessary, gave me the best opportunities that she knew how to give me.
data.author: Shemar Moore

data.quote: My mother wouldn't allow me to speak slang when I was growing up. But when I got outside, around my friends, it was 'Yo' and 'That's the joint' and 'Yo, what's up?' So I had my game for my friends and my game for my mom.
data.author: Queen Latifah

data.quote: It was tough being a single mom. It was tough being in a divorce with children. Very, very hard.
data.author: Melissa Etheridge

data.quote: What I will not do is continue to perpetuate stereotypes. I'm the daughter of a maid why do I have to also play a maid? My mom was a maid so I didn't have to be a maid.
data.author: Gina Rodriguez

data.quote: I'm not sure how young kids get to the point where they're memorizing and knowing songs, but I knew the words to 'Missing You' from John Waite probably from when I was three years old. For whatever reason, that was the song that I gravitated toward when it was on the radio and I was driving around with my mom.
data.author: Brandon Flowers

data.quote: I lead by example. My kids know what sweat is. They've seen me come home from so many runs and asked, 'What's on your skin? How did you get it?' And I tell them, 'It's from exercise!' So now my son will come home from a bike ride, take off his helmet and say, 'Look, Mom. I'm sweating! I just worked out!'
data.author: Summer Sanders

data.quote: Privacy is relational. It depends on the audience. You don't want your employer to know you're job hunting. You don't spill all about your love life to your mom or your kids. You don't tell trade secrets to your rivals.
data.author: Barton Gellman

data.quote: My mom has a rare talent for being able to open up the refrigerator, and with the peas, the leftover eggs, the cream, the spinach, the cheese, and a little rice, she can just whip up incredible risotto.
data.author: Cote de Pablo

data.quote: When my first semester grades came out, my mom and dad told me I wouldn't be playing football.
data.author: Joe Biden

data.quote: I think I grew up with a profound sense of watching people who were good people, who were smart people, who were hardworking people - God, nobody on this Earth worked harder than my mom and dad - and they had very little.
data.author: Elizabeth Warren

data.quote: I like a bohemian floral dress, but then I'll throw on a leather jacket or a pair of lace-up boots to give it an edge. My mom is always trying to get me to wear really sweet clothes. Something pink. But that's not really my look.
data.author: Margaret Qualley

data.quote: My mom is a wonderful woman. She's always been an inspiration to me, but having kids helped me make even more sense of my relationship with her.
data.author: Britney Spears

data.quote: My grandparents and my mom prayed the rosary a lot, and later in life, I had a priest friend of mine teach me centering prayer, based on Father Thomas Keating's work. That led to practicing different kinds of meditation off and on as I got older.
data.author: Tim Ryan

data.quote: I'm always awoken with the joyous sound and laughter of my son. That's the best part about being a mom.
data.author: Jane Krakowski

data.quote: On Halloween, don't you know back when you were little, your mom tells you don't eat any candy until she checks it? I used to be so tempted to eat my candy on the way to other people's houses. That used to be such a tease.
data.author: Derrick Rose

data.quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
data.author: Tim Allen

data.quote: I wasn't one to go out and buy a new car and stereo system and expensive clothes. My mom helped keep me grounded.
data.author: Christina Applegate

data.quote: I come from a family of working professionals: my dad is a chartered accountant, and my mom is a professor.
data.author: Kriti Sanon

data.quote: I may be the only mother in America who knows exactly what their child is up to all the time.
data.author: Barbara Bush

data.quote: Why do grandparents and grandchildren get along so well? The mother.
data.author: Claudette Colbert

data.quote: There are only two things a child will share willingly communicable diseases and its mother's age.
data.author: Benjamin Spock

data.quote: Motherhood is the strangest thing, it can be like being one's own Trojan horse.
data.author: Rebecca West

data.quote: I basically became a cheerleader because I had a very strict mom. That was my way of being a bad girl.
data.author: Sandra Bullock

data.quote: I sing seriously to my mom on the phone. To put her to sleep, I have to sing 'Maria' from West Side Story. When I hear her snoring, I hang up.
data.author: Adam Sandler

data.quote: I'd lose my mind if I heard my kid call the nanny Mommy.
data.author: Toni Braxton

data.quote: Mommy smoked but she didn't want us to. She saw smoke coming out of the barn one time, so we got whipped.
data.author: Loretta Lynn

data.quote: What do girls do who haven't any mothers to help them through their troubles?
data.author: Louisa May Alcott

data.quote: My mom taught us the Serenity Prayer at a young age.
data.author: Toby Keith

data.quote: I don't want to let my life as a woman pass me by. There's a time to work, there's a time to be young and crazy, and there should be a time to enjoy motherhood. I'm actually looking forward to that.
data.author: Diane Kruger

data.quote: I always knew I wanted to have children. When I met my husband, Rande, I thought, 'This is the guy.' When you are getting ready to become a mom, being in love with someone just isn't enough. You need to think about whether he would be a good parent and raise your children with similar beliefs.
data.author: Cindy Crawford

data.quote: Postpartum depression is a very real and very serious problem for many mothers. It can happen to a first time mom or a veteran mother. It can occur a few days... or a few months after childbirth.
data.author: Richard J. Codey

data.quote: I consider my mom and all my sisters my friends.
data.author: Alexa Vega

data.quote: I'm a just a mom when I walk down the street.
data.author: Alice Barrett

data.quote: In fact, my mom always told me because I was the daughter of an Army officer born overseas in Paris, France, that under the Constitution she believed that I could never run for president.
data.author: Karen Hughes

data.quote: I love playing moms. It's a lot easier than being a mom, I hear.
data.author: Faith Ford

data.quote: She hits me and she beats me and she drinks. My mom is an alcoholic.
data.author: Tonya Harding

data.quote: I probably have an earlier curfew than anyone. My mom wants to keep me really safe and my dad's not overly protective, but he's a dad no matter what.
data.author: Miley Cyrus

data.quote: My mom used to make everything. She had a great garden and composted and made everything from scratch - peanut butter, bread, jelly, everything. I don't know how she did it because all those things take time and love and labour. I only do half the stuff she does - but there's still time.
data.author: Julia Roberts

data.quote: My mother was a single mom, and most of the women I know are strong.
data.author: Regina King

data.quote: Even in high school, I'd tell my mom I was sick of swimming and wanted to try to play golf. She wasn't too happy. She'd say, 'Think about this.' And I'd always end up getting back in the pool.
data.author: Michael Phelps

data.quote: My mom still lives in Denver and some of my brothers are still in the area, so I still have strong ties there.
data.author: Terrell Davis

data.quote: I grew up painting and playing piano so when I was a little kid I thought I was going to be an artist or a painter but my mom had me taking piano lessons for about 10-12 years as a young kid.
data.author: Mike Shinoda

data.quote: In third grade, I was taking tap-dance lessons, and about six weeks before the recital I wanted to quit. My mom said, 'No, you're going to stay with it.' Well, I did it, and I was bad, too! But my parents never let their kids walk away from something because it was too hard.
data.author: Rebecca Lobo

data.quote: As a mom I know that raising children is the hardest job there is.
data.author: Hilary Rosen

data.quote: When I see my mom in the stands, it always pushes me to succeed.
data.author: Ashton Eaton

data.quote: My whole life sort of ended when my mom died.
data.author: Cheryl Strayed

data.quote: Country was about character. Country's changed because of monsters like Clear Channel who bought up all the stations and sliced them up into formats. Our demographic is now the soccer mom.
data.author: Gary Allan

data.quote: My mom was such a strong character. I don't want to say she was like a man, but she was tough.
data.author: Lance Armstrong

data.quote: I'm more straightforward, and I speak up more than I did before. When I was younger, I wouldn't speak up as much, but now that I'm a mom, things have changed.
data.author: Britney Spears

data.quote: My mom knows pretty well how I see her.
data.author: Lena Dunham

data.quote: Two weeks ago at the U.S. Amateur, my mom caddied, and that is kind of a different feeling, because she's your mom and you have to listen to her. It was really comfortable having my mom there, but it's also really relieving and comfortable to have someone that knows the course off their hat, really.
data.author: Lydia Ko

data.quote: Being a singer is all about me. About ego. Being a mom is all about being selfless - two different worlds.
data.author: Gwen Stefani

data.quote: My mom insisted on multigrain bread and never allowed soda in the house.
data.author: Vin Diesel

data.quote: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
data.author: Georgina Chapman

data.quote: My mom calls me an older soul because, growing up, she taught me stuff real early. Now I spend most of my time chasing wisdom, chasing understanding.
data.author: Ray Lewis

data.quote: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
data.author: Rich Lowry

data.quote: When I turned 18, my mom, my nana and I all went and had tattoos of our favorite Bible verses put on the inside of our wrists. Mine is 1st Timothy, 4:12.
data.author: Jordin Sparks

data.quote: I think my first big purchase was actually for my mom. She had one of those '90s TVs in her living room that's like a 10x10 brick, so I purchased her a flatscreen for her living room.
data.author: Dave Franco

data.quote: My mom told me to do whatever I wanted to do and don't get too anxious about it.
data.author: David Giuntoli

data.quote: For many women, going back to work a few months after having a baby is overwhelming and unmanageable. As strange as it may seem, things get even more difficult for a working mom after the second and third baby arrive. By that time, the romance of being a modern 'superwoman' wears off and reality sets in.
data.author: Mika Brzezinski

data.quote: I am a single mom and I'm the breadwinner and I have to work and I have to do these things and that's just the way it is. I don't think my son even knows any different.
data.author: Charisma Carpenter

data.quote: Aretha Franklin was a teenage mom, a musician who came from an incredibly Christian background, but there was a lot of love, which is really inspiring in a feminist way.
data.author: Beth Ditto

data.quote: I can't help but recall my dad and mom. Depression era kids, 8th and 9th grade educations, clawed and scratched to make a living as dairy farmers their whole life. At least two drought cycles nearly took it all away. They just worked harder, longer... and they made it.
data.author: Bob Beauprez

data.quote: My parents waited to have me and my sister - my dad was 43 when my mother had me, and my mom was 38. They purposefully waited until they had had their adventures in life so that we wouldn't represent the end of their freedom.
data.author: Christian Borle

data.quote: My mom worked as a pharmacist, but she is one of the best storytellers I know. My sister is a gospel and opera singer and my brother, who passed away, was a writer.
data.author: Tunde Adebimpe

data.quote: My deceased grandmother on my mom's side was a real fairy godmother, who lived to be 102 and who I always feel is looking after me.
data.author: Victoria Clark

data.quote: I was brought up bilingual, but there came a point where my mom went back to work and I got a white babysitter, so sadly I lost it. Now I can understand Spanish and put words together, but I don't speak it fluently. I'm ashamed of that.
data.author: Michael Trevino

data.quote: It's tough growing up where I grew up. My family is very small and really tight. Just being around the neighborhood, my brothers were always around. I didn't want to be in any trouble because I knew my mom or brothers would find out. I didn't want to hurt their feelings. I just tried to do everything right.
data.author: Derrick Rose

data.quote: You may earn whatever money you earn as a cricketer, but you want to play for your country. At the end of the day, you want to do something special. There are plenty of people who earn 50 crores or 100 crores as businessmen or big professionals or who are really doing well in business. But what gives pleasure to your mom and dad is the fame.
data.author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

data.quote: As an actress, I have put myself out there as an independent black woman, a single mom, a go-getter, a hustler who isn't afraid to survive.
data.author: LisaRaye McCoy-Misick

data.quote: I don't remember my first trip, but I do remember when my mom took me to Disney World in Orlando. It wasn't the rides but Epcot Center that most fascinated me. It made me want to see those countries that are represented there for real.
data.author: Lisa Ling

data.quote: My mom was in education, and I remember reading in one of her books about multiple intelligences - this whole theory about how there are all these different ways you can be intelligent, like eight or 10 of them or something. And one of them is emotional.
data.author: Lynn Shelton

data.quote: Before 'Lucky Louie,' nobody would ever cast me to play a mom or a wife; nobody ever saw me in that role, which is weird, since that's who I really am.
data.author: Pamela Adlon

data.quote: One day I went up to my mom and I said, 'Mom, can I have permission to build a 2.3-million electron-volt atom smasher - a betatron - in the garage?' And my mom stared at me, and she said, 'Sure. Why not? And don't forget to take out the garbage.'
data.author: Michio Kaku

data.quote: My mom and dad were actors when they were younger and had a horrible experience of it. My dad became a literary agent and my mom a casting director.
data.author: Daniel Radcliffe

data.quote: My dad didn't graduate from high school, ended up being a printing salesman, probably never made more than $8,000 a year. My mom sold real estate and did it part time.
data.author: Al Franken

data.quote: Bakers get excited over aprons. I love the soft cotton ones with pockets like my gramma and mom wore. They always kept a hankie tucked in one pocket, which wasn't sanitary, but was comforting to the child who needed a tear or nose wiped.
data.author: Regina Brett

data.quote: I remember one time when all the nuns in my Catholic grade school got around in a semicircle, me and Mom in the middle, and they said, 'Mrs. Farley, the children at school are laughing at Christopher, not with him.' I thought, 'Who cares? As long as they're laughing.'
data.author: Chris Farley

data.quote: I knew that I was a gay boy fairly early; what was interesting to me was that my mother didn't know. She made me play baseball - I had no desire to do that. I said, 'Mom, I don't like direct sunlight, I don't like bugs, I don't like grass, and I'd rather be in the house playing with your fabric samples.'
data.author: Nate Berkus

data.quote: My mom is a really good cook. We used to make dumplings together.
data.author: Jason Wu

data.quote: My mom means the world to me. She's always been the one to get me up early for work, help me with my make up and hair, and just be there to support me in whatever I do. She always makes sure that no matter what, I'm happy in what I'm doing.
data.author: Raini Rodriguez

data.quote: My mom really inspired me. She has always taught me it's not about us, it's about what we can give back.
data.author: Bailee Madison

data.quote: I've got three sisters, five aunties, and my mom. It must have had an influence on me growing up.
data.author: Zayn Malik

data.quote: I think maybe my mom thought that Katharine Hepburn would be a good role model of, like, a strong, smart, independent woman. Maybe she steered me in that direction. You know, because she was really so ahead of her time.
data.author: Gillian Jacobs

data.quote: When you can impress your mom by saying you've been to someone's concert, you know you're pretty lame.
data.author: Gillian Jacobs

data.quote: After I graduated high school and came out to do 'Buffy,' I was enrolled at my mom's university, and I was going to go get a real job. I never thought of acting and never really wanted to be an actor.
data.author: Eliza Dushku

data.quote: I don't have a creepy uncle, but I certainly have many, many uncles. My mom has twelve brothers and sisters, and my dad has two sisters and three brothers. Their maturity level is still hovering around fifteen when they all get together, but they're not necessarily creepy.
data.author: Martha MacIsaac

data.quote: You know, I only claim to play three instruments. My dad is a banker, but a drummer at heart; and my mom used to teach piano lessons when she was younger. So I can play some piano, play a little drums, and fake the bass - but banjo, mandolin, and guitar are my thing.
data.author: Charlie Worsham

data.quote: My mom has beautiful eyes, and I inherited a lot of her rituals, accentuating eyes.
data.author: Allison Williams

data.quote: My mother never said to lose weight. Diets were never a big deal. My mom was always beautiful and voluptuous and curvy, and I always thought she was gorgeous.
data.author: Christina Hendricks

data.quote: It's not about being rich, but everyone back home has a pool. And I was a total water baby. My mom couldn't get me out - she'd put my dinner plate at the end of the pool, and I'd eat my meals in the water.
data.author: Margot Robbie

data.quote: People may not know this about me, but I've always loved cooking. My favorite thing to cook is my mom's spicy spaghetti.
data.author: Becky G

data.quote: That's the Indian in me - you must put spices on everything. As a kid, whenever we got sick, my mom would take milk and put turmeric in it. That was our medicine. That was the cure-all. Some people turn to Robitussin.
data.author: Aasif Mandvi

data.quote: It's not like I'm out eating McDonald's and Del Taco every night. I eat good: my mom fixes dinner every single night - baked chicken, fish - she cooks a great meal every single night.
data.author: Bryce Harper

data.quote: I used to read music books when I was 13. My mom was working at a library. She's a librarian. I would get my mom to check out any kind of books that had anything to do with the music industry. I read a lot about royalities, publishing, marketing, stuff like that.
data.author: Juicy J

data.quote: My mom sent me money for a car, but the cops impounded it because I had no insurance.
data.author: Martin Henderson

data.quote: My mom always taught me to put toothpaste on pimples to dry them out at night. I do that all the time. I don't use anything fancy when I get a pimple. And I never use the same toothpaste for long because I get bored. So I'll do peppermint and then one month I'll do cinnamon. I'm creative.
data.author: Gigi Hadid

data.quote: When I come to visit my mom - every two or three months - I generally spend five or six hours with her each day. She's always immensely glad to see me, her eldest child, her only son.
data.author: Michael Dirda

data.quote: It's been a lot of fun getting to work with Tracy Middendorf, who plays my mom. As an actor, it's always fun to have different parents and to create different familial dynamics than you have in your real life.
data.author: Willa Fitzgerald

data.quote: You really don't need to study how to change a diaper. As a new mom, you learn pretty darn quickly!
data.author: Ivanka Trump

data.quote: I was raised vegan. My mom would always make quinoa with squash and kale, hippie stuff like that. Now I eat meat, but I try to be conscious about where it's coming from.
data.author: Zoe Kravitz

data.quote: My mom and I have always been very close since she did raise me as, like, a single mom. My friends and everyone I know are like, 'Wow, you guys really have a really good relationship.' She's with me a lot of the time, so people find that kind of shocking.
data.author: Tiffany Trump

data.quote: My mom's best friend growing up was diagnosed with AIDS, and he basically raised me when my mom was launching her business. Although I didn't understand at the time what HIV or AIDS was, I knew that's what he passed away from.
data.author: Solange Knowles

data.quote: When I was 13, I would come visit my aunt and uncle in New York. I decided I wanted to live with them after seeing my cousin's school. Honestly, I just wanted to go to a school where I didn't have to wear uniforms, and my mom said okay.
data.author: Priyanka Chopra

data.quote: Having children is not for everyone, but I think it's a beautiful lesson in it not being all about me anymore. It's a relief, in a way. It's like, this is her story now, and I'm her mom. It's a nice shift.
data.author: Lake Bell

data.quote: My mom is incredibly stylish, and she gets it from my grandmother. I feel like I can't live up to how chic they are as women. They are great role models for aging gracefully, and that's a thing that is very key that I try to always emulate.
data.author: Lake Bell

data.quote: My parents know I was outgoing as a child, and whenever people came over, I'd automatically do impressions of them as soon as they left; it was my mom's favorite thing. Yes, I grew up in Hollywood, but not in any rich neighborhood.
data.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

data.quote: My mom, Nellie, got me a rosary at church. I don't use it to pray before a competition. I'll just pray normally to myself, but I have it there in case.
data.author: Simone Biles

data.quote: I had a lot of energy, and my mom decided to look for a place where I can spend the energy, because I was jumping on the couch and furniture, and I was jumping on the top of the things in the house.
data.author: Nadia Comaneci

data.quote: At a show, I'll look out from the stage and see a woman with a pearl necklace next to a guy in a Grateful Dead T-shirt next to a young kid with his mom. It's fun to see them all together.
data.author: Hiromi Uehara

data.quote: It was the late '70s when my parents met. My dad was a lighting director for a soap opera, and my mom was a temp at the studio. They moved into a house in The Valley in L.A., to a neighborhood that was leafy and affordable.
data.author: Meghan Markle

data.quote: At the start of each week, I generally cook a box of quinoa, and while it's simmering, I saute onions, garlic and any veggies I have on hand in a separate pan. I season the vegetables with Spike, a seasoning blend my mom always used when I was growing up, or a little Bragg Liquid Aminos. I always add crushed red pepper and chopped fresh herbs.
data.author: Meghan Markle

data.quote: I'm like every waitress in every diner I'm like every mom driving her kids to school. I'm nothing special at all.
data.author: Katherine Dunn

data.quote: Dad told me that before I was born, he would put my mom's stomach up to the speaker and play Led Zeppelin.
data.author: Thomas Rhett

data.quote: I like superheroes who are very human and underdog. That's why I relate to my character in 'A Flying Jatt': because he is a very normal person and very human. He was very unsure about his super powers; he didn't know how to use them. He is scared of heights, speed. Especially he is scared of his mom, but he has to listen to her.
data.author: Tiger Shroff

data.quote: There was always an unspoken generosity about my mom.
data.author: Matt Lauer

data.quote: I didn't grow up with a lot of money, so my mom didn't have random money to buy me a car, and I didn't have money to have a car unless I worked, so I didn't get a car until I got my first job at 18.
data.author: Dominick Cruz

data.quote: My dad and mom were in bands: the Soda Jerks, Fat Time, Girls at Play - which is a play on Men at Work.
data.author: Sia

data.quote: My mom named me Pom because she said it sounded like a combination of Korean words that mean 'spring' and 'tiger.' So, it's very unique!
data.author: Pom Klementieff

data.quote: It was so weird that I would end up directing 'The Greatest Game Ever Played,' because, y'know, I'm not a big golfer myself. But I grew up around the game. My mom and dad kind of built their dream house off the 11th fairway of Shady Oaks Country Club in Fort Worth.
data.author: Bill Paxton

data.quote: Marvin Gaye is an inspiration to me. He was one of the first Motown musicians that my mom and dad introduced me to, and I always thought it would be a good idea if I was ever an artist, and now I am, to make a record called 'Marvin Gaye.'
data.author: Charlie Puth

data.quote: I didn't understand that I could sing until I was like 11 or 12. My mom heard me singing around the house and she said, What are you doing? You really can sing! So then I started going to school and singing to the girls.
data.author: Chris Brown

data.quote: My mom is going to kill me for talking about sleeping with people. But I don't want to put myself in the position where I'm in a monogamous relationship right now. I'm not dating just one person. 'Sex and the City' changed everything for me because those girls would sleep with so many people.
data.author: Lindsay Lohan

data.quote: I care so passionately about improving the quality of life for women and girls, not just here in the United States, but internationally as well. I am a single mom and I raised a daughter who is now a young adult.
data.author: Valerie Jarrett

data.quote: We were poor. But my mom never accepted that. She worked hard to become a residential contractor - got her master's with honors at the University of New Orleans. I used to go to every class with her. Her father was my paternal figure.
data.author: Frank Ocean

data.quote: There's been times when I've had heartbreaking moments and I'm like, 'I can't believe you said that,' or 'I can't believe you did that'. And it hurts, it still hurts, and it'll always hurt, but I've never had somebody that I truly cared about just walk out on me, whether it was a boyfriend, or an aunt, mom or dad.
data.author: Shailene Woodley

data.quote: My mom and dad passed away from cancer. Within nine months, I lost both of my folks. Immediately after that, I had a horrible betrayal where my brother, who worked for me, stole a lot of my money. He's in jail now.
data.author: Dane Cook

data.quote: Mom's dad was in the army, stormed the beach at Normandy, fought through the French hedgerows, the Battle of the Ardennes, the Battle of the Bulge, and liberated concentration camps at the end of the war.
data.author: Mark Hoppus

data.quote: I promised my mom that if, after a year of putting 150 percent into my career it didn't work out, I would go back to school. I never did go back.
data.author: Queen Latifah

data.quote: I warm up with my mom and make sure I understand what the songs are about and make sure I'm using the right technique. To be honest with you, I really don't practice a lot... Usually, I say a prayer and ask the Lord to sing with me and help me and stand on the stage with me.
data.author: Jackie Evancho

data.quote: My mom is big on moisturizer and water. She always reminds me to drink a lot of water and wear sunglasses because I always forget them when I go out, even though they are one of my favorite accessories. She always reminds me about wrinkles, and always did, so it's kind of been ingrained into me.
data.author: Brittany Snow

data.quote: People still ask my husband and me which of us is the mom - which, as one lesbian friend pointed out to me, is like asking which chopstick is the fork. This pressure on us to embody normative traditions can be paralysing.
data.author: Andrew Solomon

data.quote: I am so blessed. I have an incredible wife, children I adore; I'm a very happy man. I've got a great mom and dad and brothers and sisters and stuff, so I've always been happy. And I never stop smiling.
data.author: Michael Kelly

data.quote: I'm a real stay-at-home mom. I'm really hands-on. Everything else became secondary.
data.author: Drew Barrymore

data.quote: I grew up in Marcy Projects in Brooklyn, and my mom and pop had an extensive record collection, so Michael Jackson and Stevie Wonder and all of those sounds and souls of Motown filled the house.
data.author: Jay-Z

data.quote: Having a mom as a hairdresser was really awesome: I was always her test dummy. I've had every style, every color you could imagine.
data.author: Alessia Cara

data.quote: I know a lot of people who really aren't beautiful because their attitudes are very nasty... Whether I make the 50 most beautiful list or not, I'm always going to feel like I'm number one most beautiful to myself... I get that from my mom, and my daddy and my friends who raised me.
data.author: Queen Latifah

data.quote: I read that John Hughes script for 'Mr. Mom,' and I thought, 'This guy is a funny writer.' I went: 'You ought to stick around and direct this thing.' But he didn't; he left, and look what he became. A really legendary comedy director.
data.author: Michael Keaton

data.quote: My mom had Julia Child and 'The Fannie Farmer Cookbook' on top of the refrigerator, and she had a small repertoire of French dishes.
data.author: Anthony Bourdain

data.quote: I've always wanted to be sure my parents approve of what I do. Even with my tattoos, my mom went with me.
data.author: Ashley Tisdale

data.quote: There was never a child so lovely but his mother was glad to get him to sleep.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: My mom and my dad were both very sociable, meeting lots of interesting people.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: My mom was on the United Way group that decides how to allocate the money and looks at all the different charities and makes the very hard decisions about where that pool of funds is going to go.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: My dad died when I was young; my mom remarried with more haste than sense to a fellow... he wasn't evil or anything, but he was worthless.
data.author: P. J. O'Rourke

data.quote: I'm too tough and sensitive to have to have some pubescent twerp with his mom's earring in his tongue, who combs his hair with Redi-Whip and has an Ani DiFranco tattoo on his shin, come show me how a computer works.
data.author: P. J. O'Rourke

data.quote: I just wasn't cut out to be a Chinese Tiger Mom. I'm more of an Irish Setter Dad.
data.author: P. J. O'Rourke

data.quote: When my mom ran for the Senate, my dad was there for her every step of the way. I can still hear her saying in her beautiful voice, 'Why should women have any less say than men, about the great decisions facing our nation?'
data.author: Mitt Romney

data.quote: I love my dad. It's fair to say that I probably would not have thought of politics had I not seen my mom and dad involved in politics.
data.author: Mitt Romney

data.quote: My guess is that my mom and dad are very actively involved in the affairs of the next life, and they don't spend too much time looking back. My dad used to say he always looks forward; he never looks back.
data.author: Mitt Romney

data.quote: My mom and I have always been really close. She's always been the friend that was always there. There were times when, in middle school and junior high, I didn't have a lot of friends. But my mom was always my friend. Always.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: When I was younger we had a grape arbor, and my mom would go out and pick grapes and make grape jam in the sink - boil it, put it in jars, and give it away as gifts.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: I've been my mom's kitchen helper since I was a little kid.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: I once went on the most grueling radio tour. Living in hotel rooms, sleeping in the backs of rental cars as my mom drove to three different cities in one day.
data.author: Taylor Swift

data.quote: My question about luging is, How do you get into the luge community to begin with? Is it one day like, 'Mom, Dad, I really want to luge.' And your parents are like: 'O.K., I'll quit my job. We'll move to an Alpine community.'
data.author: Douglas Coupland

data.quote: My dad was a bartender. My mom was a cashier, a maid and a stock clerk at K-Mart. They never made it big. They were never rich. And yet they were successful. Because just a few decades removed from hopelessness, they made possible for us all the things that had been impossible for them.
data.author: Marco Rubio

data.quote: My parents were working class folks. My dad was a bartender for most of his life, my mom was a maid and a cashier and a stock clerk at WalMart. We were not people of financial means in terms of significant financial means. I always told them, 'I didn't always have what I wanted. I always had what I needed.' My parents always provided that.
data.author: Marco Rubio

data.quote: It wasn't so long ago that I was a working mom myself. And I know that sometimes, much as we all hate to admit it, it's just easier to park the kids in front of the TV for a few hours, so we can pay the bills or do the laundry or just have some peace and quiet for a change.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: As a mom, I know it is my responsibility, and no one else's, to raise my kids. But we have to ask ourselves, what does it mean when so many parents are finding their best efforts undermined by an avalanche of advertisements aimed at our kids.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: Our life before moving to Washington was filled with simple joys... Saturdays at soccer games, Sundays at grandma's house... and a date night for Barack and me was either dinner or a movie, because as an exhausted mom, I couldn't stay awake for both.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: My dad was an autoworker, my mom was a clerk. Until I was thirty-five, I never made more than fifteen thousand dollars a year.
data.author: Michael Moore

data.quote: All the awards in the world, you can get into all the nightclubs, they'll send you the nicest clothes. Nothing better than walking into your dad's restaurant and seeing a smile on his face and knowing that your mom and dad and your sister are real proud of you.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: My mom and I are very close.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: No press, no television. If my mom calls and says, 'Did you hear about?' I don't want to know nothing about anything that is going on in relation to music. I shut it all off.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: When I was a kid, there were no credit cards. Instead, retailers offered layaway plans. My mom would go to a store, such as a furniture outlet, choose the sofa she wanted, and put it on layaway. That meant she put a little money down to hold the sofa, and every payday she'd pay a little toward the purchase.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: My mom loved rock 'n roll. My father hated it. We couldn't play it when he was around.
data.author: Patti Smith

data.quote: I'm a human being, I'm a friend, I'm a mom, I'm a writer, and I'm an artist. I do play electric guitar and all of that, but in the end, I'm just a person.
data.author: Patti Smith

data.quote: I think my love of journalizing my life comes from my mom.
data.author: Jeff Bridges

data.quote: My mom wasn't a movie star.
data.author: Jeff Bridges

data.quote: When I was really young, my mom enrolled me in dance classes.
data.author: Jeff Bridges

data.quote: How simple a thing it seems to me that to know ourselves as we are, we must know our mothers names.
data.author: Alice Walker

data.quote: My parents met because my father was an actor friend of one of my mom's brothers, but my mother has never set foot on the stage - she's quite shy. data.quote: I can honestly say, after talking about my mom passing away, I got the biggest weight off of my chest. Comedy is my therapy. That's how I deal with my problems, my personal battles. I talk about it. I give it to my fans. When they laugh at it, it's a release, for lack of a better word.
data.author: Kevin Hart

data.quote: My mom was very strict. She didn't let me watch anything rated R or anything with cussing.
data.author: Kevin Hart

data.quote: Being in Australia, I was really sun conscious. For a couple of summers there, I did the baby oil thing, and my my mom said, 'Just don't. You'll regret it.'
data.author: Cate Blanchett

data.quote: I'm frugal. I've always been this way. When I was young, my mom would give me my allowance, and I'd peel off a little each week and have some to spare.

data.quote: My mom never taught me to be waiting for some prince on a white horse to swipe me off my feet.
data.author: Tyra Banks

data.quote: My mom read French 'Elle' when I was a little girl, and so, when I was 15 or 16, I said, 'I want to work in fashion.'

data.quote: Sometimes you think you aren't a good mama you always feel a bit guilty when you're a mom. You want to be everywhere.
data.author: Carine Roitfeld

data.quote: I'm not bothered by the idea of getting old, or I guess you could say by having arrived at old. I was 10 when my mom turned 55. For 1955, she was a very old mom.

data.quote: My mom, if you asked her if she was interested in whether or not people gambled, would say no.
data.author: Penn Jillette

data.quote: My mom and dad were divorced, and although they got along very well, my mom thought American television was reprehensible, so I was raised on the BBC. I kind of agreed with her. We watched American news, though.

data.quote: I kept telling my mom that reading comic books would pay off.
data.author: Joss Whedon

data.quote: I'd go to, like, six different schools in one year. We were on welfare, and my mom never ever worked.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: Language-wise, my mom and dad's dialect, they're pretty obscure. It's Chinese, but not your traditional Chinese, like Cantonese or Mandarin. It wasn't something that I got to use very much growing up. We eventually just spoke English around the house.
data.author: James Wan

data.quote: There were times my mom and I butted heads - over my curfew, over something like that. Whenever we would hit these moments of emotional backfire, she would say, 'You just don't understand what it's like to be a mother... I could never handle losing you.' I was like, 'OK, but just, like, chill out.'

data.quote: We had very few things. I had a couple pairs of jeans, a couple shirts. And same with my mom and sister. I think my sister had, like, two toys. We were living off of instant noodles.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: I was 3 when I told my mom that I knew what my dharma was and that I wanted to be an actor.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: I was home-schooled, was always very close with my mom and was very straight-laced and square. I was never the rebellious one, and I never threw hissy fits.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: When I was seven, I had been very vocal about wanting to be an actor. And my mom decided that we would try it out for a couple weeks and come to L.A. from Sacramento.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: We lived in just a studio apartment with just a room and a bed that came out of the wall, and my mom couldn't afford even a Happy Meal. We ate Top Ramen. I had no toys, and I had, like, two shirts, a pair of jeans, and that was it. But I had my mom to myself, and I remember it being the coolest period of time. I loved it. I really loved it.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: I didn't realise how hard it was to be a mom and keep it all together.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: I was home-schooled, was always very close with my mom, and was very straight-laced and square. I was never the rebellious one, and I never threw hissy fits. I was the type of person that would show a Powerpoint presentation about why I should do something versus crying and screaming over it.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: I was born in Sacramento but moved to Los Angeles with my mom and my little sister when I was seven.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quote: My mom used to tell me, 'If you read 50 books, I'll get you a motorbike.'
data.author: Orlando Bloom

data.quote: I'm not a religious person. My mom was of Jewish blood and my dad was Protestant.
data.author: Daniel Radcliffe

data.quote: My dad believes in God, I think. I'm not sure if my mom does. I don't.
data.author: Daniel Radcliffe

data.quote: I don't know where my romanticism comes from. My mom and dad would read to me a lot. 'Treasure Island,' 'Robinson Crusoe,' tales of chivalry and knights, things like that. Those are the stories I loved growing up.

data.quote: For years, my mom dated a man who was really active in the Baptist church in the town next to the town I grew up in, and so he used to drag me to these Baptist church services that lasted forever. I remember that I didn't like the church services, but I really liked the music.

data.quote: When I was little, I'd pick flowers wherever I traveled with my mom, then dry them, cover them with resin, and turn them into paperweights.

data.quote: My mom grew up in the Soviet Bloc, and she was a Tiger Mom. We didn't get away with much.
data.author: Ivanka Trump

data.quote: I dyed my hair blonde when I was 14. My mom was not happy. But I love being blonde.
data.author: Rita Ora

data.quote: I could get away with not taking care of myself as a bachelorette but as a mom I can't.
data.author: Alanis Morissette

data.quote: My mom is at my house every day, and she nags me about everything, especially hygiene.
data.author: Shia LaBeouf

data.quote: My mom is the backbone not just of my family but of many families.
data.author: Shia LaBeouf

data.quote: Like a lot of you, I grew up in a family on the ragged edges of the middle class. My daddy sold carpeting and ended up as a maintenance man. After he had a heart attack, my mom worked the phones at Sears so we could hang on to our house.

data.quote: My mom would have different fragrances for different times of the year. They were a part of her identity. I don't remember the specific ones she used, but I remember the bottles.

data.quote: My mom taught me this really great beauty tip. She used to put oil or mayonnaise on the bottom half of her hair before she would shower.
data.author: Blake Lively

data.quote: My mom and dad always taught acting, so instead of getting me babysitters, they would just bring me to class.
data.author: Blake Lively

data.quote: My mom is a huge woman of worth for me because she's been my idol my whole life. My mom was someone who juggled everything. She had her own career, she raised five kids, she was Superwoman... and she was never satisfied doing just one thing because... she probably just had too much energy.
data.author: Blake Lively

data.quote: I used to have a blankie, and when my mom had to wash it, I would sit outside the dryer and watch it go round and round, and cry.
data.author: Drew Barrymore

data.quote: I grew up in a makeup chair. And to see the women around me getting ready was so aspirational. It's about mothers and daughters, a girl watching her mom at a vanity table.
data.author: Drew Barrymore

data.quote: My parents did divorce, but my dad has always been present for me and loving me and my mom as well when she was alive.

data.quote: My mom and dad used to tell me, 'You've got to see this film,' and they were influential to a high degree of the films I saw as a kid.

data.quote: As I celebrate life, I can't help but think how young my mom was when she died of a heart attack at 53. My mom didn't get to meet her grandchildren, but I'm determined to watch mine grow up.
data.author: Andie MacDowell

data.quote: Okay, fluoride in the water to help our teeth. Well, shouldn't that be the job of your mom and dad? To teach you how to brush your teeth and use mouth wash? What do we need the government to do it for? Clearly, what a scam. Fluoride in the water.

data.quote: If I were to work with my mom, I probably would not want her to play my mom. That would get too real.
data.author: Zooey Deschanel

data.quote: My nursery school did a production of 'The Three Little Pigs.' I played the third pig. When the wolf knocked on my door, I refused to get up and answer it because, to me, he was knocking the wrong way. I just lay there, snoring away on stage, fully immersed in my character. My dad turned to my mom and said: 'Dustin Hoffman.'

data.quote: I wanted to be a child actor so bad that every day I'd beg my parents if I could audition, but my mom said, 'Not until you can drive yourself to auditions.'
data.author: Zooey Deschanel

data.quote: I became a mom at 37 and having a child has been an emancipation for me.
data.author: Tori Amos

data.quote: When I was little, my mom tells me, I used to say things like, 'Mom do you hear the string section? Do you hear the string section?' And she would look at me and say, 'No honey, I don't know what you're talking about.'

data.author: Paul Ryan

data.author: Matthew Desmond

data.quote: I grew up with my mom being very, very cheap, so when it's free, I'm like, 'Oh my God, it's free - I have to take as much as I can!'

data.quote: One of the most important things for me is my hair. I've always been about my hair, and I love that my mom and my nana taught me how to take care of it myself. It goes through a lot every day, but I try to keep it healthy. I have to admit, it can get a little dead on the ends.

data.quote: We come from fallible parents who were kids once, who decided to have kids and who had to learn how to be parents. Faults are made and damage is done, whether it's conscious or not. data.quote: I remember that at the beginning of the month, the kind of menus my mom and father would prepare for us would have fish, chicken. But at the end of the month - because my father would be waiting for paycheck - the refrigerator would get empty. I remember that without a lot of food left, some of the best meals happened right there.

data.quote: My mom brought me up to believe that my talent is a gift and a blessing.

data.quote: I'm obsessed with being a mom.
